overview:
Lacey Brandt serves as Chief Financial officer for JumpTap. Ms. Brandt has over 20 years of financial management experience with high-growth technology companies including CFO positions in both public and private companies.

Prior to JumpTap, Ms. Brandt served as CFO for Spotfire, a provider of analytic software applications. Before to Spotfire, Ms. Brandt was CFO of eXcelon, a NADSAQ-listed software company specializing in databases and XML-based technologies for the telecommunications and other industries. As CFO of eXcelon, Ms. Brandt led mergers and acquisitions, managed financial and business plan development and analysis and positioned the company for an IPO in the mid-1990s. She began her career in commercial lending at Bank of Boston.
